page.title: 11SKELMORLIE POPULATION
page.content: The population of Skelmorlie is about 1628.This can be broken down into 502 children and teenagers,894 adults and 232 pensioners. At present we have found the average family size to be 2.5 children per family.Many of our parents were born and bred here and the average for them were 5 children per family.So family sizes have dropped in the last 30 years. For the very young and old of the village there are special welfare services.There are baby clinics and health and detal checkups for school chlidren.For the old there are foot clinics,meals on wheels,house helps, the district nurse as well as church visitors and outings arranged by var- ious orgaisations.
